Text: Contact InfoSince changes are in store for ENE I wanted to pass along the following contact information Jane Wilhite Leverkuhn Houston TX h c Keep in touch and take care Jane

RE Dynegy Broadband Marketing and Trade Update on MSA Cc I dont know all I know is that it was executed in order to get the master netting agreement done with Dynegy You might check with Marie Heard since she worked on the master netting agreement Original Message From Hill Robin Sent Tuesday November AM To Wilhite Jane Cooper Tracy J EBS Cc Rossi Robbi Subject RE Dynegy Broadband Marketing and Trade Update on MSA Ive checked her desk and its not there and I havent received anything either Did they send it by UPS Robin L Hill Legal Specialist Enron Broadband Services Inc Smith St Suite b Houston Texas fax Original Message From Wilhite Jane Sent Tuesday November AM To Cooper Tracy J EBS Cc Rossi Robbi Hill Robin Subject RE Dynegy Broadband Marketing and Trade Update on MSA Apparently they have signed the agreement Can someone please check Tracys desk and see if we have gotten the signed copy Thanks Jane Wilhite ext Original Message From Cooper Tracy J EBS Sent Friday November PM To Wilhite Jane Cc Rossi Robbi Hill Robin Subject RE Dynegy Broadband Marketing and Trade Update on MSA Jane I called and left a message wSteven Smith and response before I went out Robin Hill has the information not sure what the hold up is Steven says its bc he is trying to find someone to sign the document but that was almost two weeks ago Tracy Original Message From Wilhite Jane Sent Friday November PM To Cooper Tracy J EBS Subject RE Dynegy Broadband Marketing and Trade Update on MSA any response Original Message From Cooper Tracy J EBS Sent Monday October PM To Rossi Robbi Cc Wilhite Jane Subject Dynegy Broadband Marketing and Trade Update on MSA Robbi I still havent heard from these folks I talked to Steven Smith last week on and he said there were no issues with the MSA but he was having a hard time finding someone to sign it I told Jane this info last week I havent heard back from him either via email or phone should I pursue this further One more call before I go out on maternity leave I know Jane is anxious to get this back signed Please advise Thanks Tracy

RE CW MSA redlined comparison you requested Cc Sandy Can you check with Robbi or Marie and compare this to an older version of our standard MSA It looks identical to what we used to use prior to Cynthia coming up with the USEurope version It incoporates the concepts of contract value and replacement value Thanks Jane Wilhite ext Original Message From Haldeman Sandy Sent Monday October AM To Wilhite Jane Cc St Clair Carol Subject CW MSA redlined comparison you requested JANE attached please find the redlined comparison you requested of the Kevin Paley document CW MSA Vdoc compared to the standard MSA Hope this comparison is helpful and shows you all the changes made Call me please at Ext if you need me to do anything else to assist you in comparing the documents Thanks Sandy Ext Attachment Sandy Can you do this Tracy or Robin should be able to send you our form Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From Wilhite Jane Jane NRONcom To Hawthorn Jay Jay NRONnet St Clair Carol CarolSt NRONcom Sidler Shirley Shirley NRONnet Sent Mon Oct Subject RE CW MSA Can we get this marked against our standard It looks like our old version Thanks Jane Original Message From Hawthorn Jay Sent Sunday October PM To St Clair Carol Wilhite Jane Sidler Shirley Subject FW CW MSA All Doesnt look like hes too interested in our Master Can we take another look at theirs to see if they made any changes at all that we wanted I havent yet had a chance to take a look at it Thanks Jay Original Message From Paley Kevin Sent Fri AM To Hawthorn Jay Cc Subject CW MSA Jay Attached is our Final Version of our MSA We have looked at your new one but have decided that it will take us too much time to adjust for it We have approved your guarantee I hope you choose to go forward with this MSA Kevin CW MSA Vdoc Kevin Paley Senior Director Trading Risk Management Service Providersl Cable Wireless Delivering the Internet Promise wwwcwcom Phone Fax
Thanks for the cookies I broke down and had a second Jane Wilhite ext
Bethlehem SteelWe have received executed confirmations for all outstanding transactions Jeff Can you send me a copy of the termination letter Thanks Jane Wilhite ext

RE Bethlehem Steel Cc credit Thanks Jane Wilhite ext Original Message From Eubanks Jr David W Sent Monday December AM To Wilhite Jane Cc McFatridge Thomas Subject Bethlehem Steel Jane Bethlehem Steel paid on David W Eubanks Jr Specialist Physical Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC Phone Fax email File Bethlhem Steel wire dated xls

FW Bethlehem Steel exposure details Cc credit Jeff Attached are the exposures pre and postpetition for Bethlehem Steel seperated by month We sent out an invoice for the second half of October on the th and payment is due the th of November We will put together December exposure as soon as the December index is published Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Jane Wilhite ext PREPETITION September for September delivered gas on TAGG VZ Sitara for September delivered gas on TAGG VZ Sitara at NipscoNGPL for September delivered gas on Sitara at TCO Appalachian POL Total for September October for gas delivered Oct through Oct on TAGG VC Sitara for gas delivered Oct through Oct on SITARA Total for October TOTAL PREPETITION Note Marktomarket value of forward contracts at was POSTPETITION October for gas delivered Oct through Oct on TAGG VC Sitara for gas delivered Oct through Oct on SITARA Total for October November for gas delivered Nov through Nov on TAGG VC Sitara for gas delivered Nov through Nov on SITARA entire amount prepaid by Bethlehem Total for November TOTAL POSTPETITION THROUGH NOVEMBER

RE Bethlehem Steel exposure details Cc credit Jeff Payment should be due on the last business day of the preceding month for the contract that extends through March Bryce Can you let us know if Bethlehem doesnt make their payment today Thanks Jane Wilhite ext Original Message From Wilhite Jane Sent Thursday November PM To Hodge Jeffrey T Cc Mellencamp Lisa Tribolet Michael Rohauer Tanya Williams Jason R Credit Baxter Bryce Subject FW Bethlehem Steel exposure details Importance High Jeff Attached are the exposures pre and postpetition for Bethlehem Steel seperated by month We sent out an invoice for the second half of October on the th and payment is due the th of November We will put together December exposure as soon as the December index is published Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Jane Wilhite ext PREPETITION September for September delivered gas on TAGG VZ Sitara for September delivered gas on TAGG VZ Sitara at NipscoNGPL for September delivered gas on Sitara at TCO Appalachian POL Total for September October for gas delivered Oct through Oct on TAGG VC Sitara for gas delivered Oct through Oct on SITARA Total for October TOTAL PREPETITION Note Marktomarket value of forward contracts at was POSTPETITION October for gas delivered Oct through Oct on TAGG VC Sitara for gas delivered Oct through Oct on SITARA Total for October November for gas delivered Nov through Nov on TAGG VC Sitara for gas delivered Nov through Nov on SITARA entire amount prepaid by Bethlehem Total for November TOTAL POSTPETITION THROUGH NOVEMBER

Empire Paper Group LLC ISDA Cc We need to draft an ISDA for Empire Paper Group LLC We would like to insert language that will allow Enron to get a second lien on the assets after the primary lender instead of using the CSA Cross default thresholds are MM and MM respectively for Empire and Enron Please send the draft to credit first and we will check the new language The underwriters are Jay Epstein and Chris Croon If you have any questions please feel free to call Thanks Jane Wilhite ext

empire paper Cc Susan Could you please add the following additional events of default to the Empire ISDA EBITDAInterest x No additional debt greater than MM If you have any questions or would like to discuss please feel free to call Thank you Jane Wilhite ext

empire paper Cc Susan Could you please add the following additional events of default to the Empire ISDA EBITDAInterest x No additional debt greater than MM If you have any questions or would like to discuss please feel free to call Thank you Jane Wilhite ext

Empire Paper Group LLC ISDA Cc We need to draft an ISDA for Empire Paper Group LLC We would like to insert language that will allow Enron to get a second lien on the assets after the primary lender instead of using the CSA Cross default thresholds are MM and MM respectively for Empire and Enron Please send the draft to credit first and we will check the new language The underwriters are Jay Epstein and Chris Croon If you have any questions please feel free to call Thanks Jane Wilhite ext

RE Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing Cc Sure I talked to Ed Sacks and there are some on the list that he is already working on I imagine that we have defaulted under the surety and the CP can now collect but have not seen the actual notices yet I have asked Mary Grisaffi to forward them to Carol St Clair for review Original Message From Steffes James D Sent Wednesday December AM To Black Don Wilhite Jane St Clair Carol Cc Herndon Rogers Dietrich Janet Subject RE Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing Didnt know about this Have we compared this list to our gas market termination list Jane Can you please send me the list Jim Original Message From Black Don Sent Wednesday December AM To Steffes James D Cc Herndon Rogers Dietrich Janet Subject FW Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing Jim Are you all over this Is there a chance that we lose operations at these utilities before we can sell the markets Original Message From Wilhite Jane Sent Wednesday December AM To Black Don Cc St Clair Carol Sacks Edward Subject FW Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing Don Attached is a list of surety bonds which involve EES with expiration dates that range from February through October that we do not plan on renewing Notices were received regarding early termination andor nonrenewal All of the notices will be forwarded to Carol St Clair If you have any questions or would like to discuss further please feel free to call Thank you Jane Wilhite ext Original Message From Bradford William S Sent Tuesday December PM To Wilhite Jane Subject FW Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing Original Message From Grisaffi Mary Sent Tuesday December AM To Bradford William S Cc Bouillion James L Deffner Joseph Marshall David Subject Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing I called Molly Harris she said there wasnt any one left in her dept and that you should be able to help with the bonds for these companies if there is someone else I should be contact please let me know Bill attached is a list of bonds that our broker John L Wortham LLP received a notice of cancellation on from Firemans Fund and Safeco Please determine which obligations will be required in the future However our broker has offered assistance in establishing a replacement surety but you may also want to investigate alternative form of acceptable security Please let me know if you need copies or if there is anything I can do to help Thanks File EEMC cancelled bonds xls File Grisaffi Maryvcf

FW Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power MarketingOriginal Message From Bradford William S Sent Tuesday December PM To Wilhite Jane Subject FW Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing Original Message From Grisaffi Mary Sent Tuesday December AM To Bradford William S Cc Bouillion James L Deffner Joseph Marshall David Subject Bond Cancellation EESEnron Energy Marketing CorpEnron Power Marketing I called Molly Harris she said there wasnt any one left in her dept and that you should be able to help with the bonds for these companies if there is someone else I should be contact please let me know Bill attached is a list of bonds that our broker John L Wortham LLP received a notice of cancellation on from Firemans Fund and Safeco Please determine which obligations will be required in the future However our broker has offered assistance in establishing a replacement surety but you may also want to investigate alternative form of acceptable security Please let me know if you need copies or if there is anything I can do to help Thanks
